# UIUserInterfaceLayoutDirection.leftToRight

**Case**

The layout direction is left to right.

## Declaration

```swift
case leftToRight
```

## Constants

- **UIUserInterfaceLayoutDirection.rightToLeft**: The layout direction right to left.
